name: Herd: elephant
description:
Description

This is my first game to be published. The game will follow an elephant as he takes a long journey and along the way the player will explore a number of aspects to the animal kingdom (as seen through an elephant' s eyes.)
Remember to avoid the lions!

Controls

AWSD or Arrow keys - move around/movement

Space bar - Interact (with the sign)

Please check back often as more content will be added in coming days/weeks, I am currently just asking for initial feedback on what works well in this demo level.
